definition: To move or travel a certain distance, typically by foot or using a mode of transportation, with the implication of covering a specific distance or completing a journey. This word is commonly used when referring to the act of physically progressing from one point to another, often involving the return to a starting point or the completion of a round trip.

examples.english: I still have to cover 10 kilometers.

examples.german: Wir haben eine lange Strecke zurückgelegt.
Er hat den Weg zu Fuß zurückgelegt.
examples.english: He covered the distance on foot.
You have to take the flight.

examples.german: Die Mannschaft hat eine weite Reise zurückgelegt.
examples.english: The team made a long journey.
